24.title: Girl of the Limberlost (version 2)
24.description: A Girl of the Limberlost, a novel by American writer and naturalist Gene Stratton-Porter, was published in August, 1909. It is considered a classic of Indiana literature. It is the sequel to her earlier novel Freckles. The story takes place in Indiana, in and around the famous Limberlost Swamp. - Summary by Wikipedia
